SIGNUP.TITLE: Get Started Now
SIGNUP.SUBTITLE: Please enter your information to access your account

MESSAGES.SUCCESS_DETAIL: We’ve sent a confirmation link to {{email}}.
MESSAGES.FAILURE_EMAIL_EXISTS: This email is already registered. Please log in instead.
MESSAGES.FAILURE_INVALID_INPUT: Some of your inputs are invalid. Please check and try again.
MESSAGES.FAILURE_WEAK_PASSWORD: Your password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one.
MESSAGES.FAILURE_SERVER: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
MESSAGES.FAILURE: Something went wrong. Please try again.

ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH: Must be at least {{requiredLength}} characters long.
ERRORS.EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.

ERRORS.INVALID: The entered value is not valid.

CONFIRM_EMAIL.TITLE: Confirm Email
CONFIRM_EMAIL.SUBTITLE: Enter the verification code sent to your email to activate your account

MESSAGES.SUCCESS: Your email has been confirmed successfully.
MESSAGES.INVALID_OR_EXPIRED: The verification code is invalid or has expired. Please try again or request a new one.
MESSAGES.USER_NOT_FOUND: We couldn’t find your account. Please sign up again.
MESSAGES.ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email is already confirmed. You can sign in directly.

MESSAGES.RESEND_SUCCESS_OTP: A new verification code has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
MESSAGES.RESEND_SUCCESS_LINK: A new verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
MESSAGES.RESEND_SUCCESS_GENERIC: If your email is registered, you will receive a confirmation message shortly.
MESSAGES.RESEND_ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email is already confirmed. You can sign in directly.
